page.title: 07A SPECIAL OCCASION_ESTOVER
page.content: ON JUNE 5th THE JUNIOR{SPORTS DAY}WAS HELD.THERE WERE{LOTS OF EVENTS}AND BLUES WERE LEADING.THE SCORE WAS 236.YELLOWS WERE SECOND WITH 211.REDS WERE THIRD WITH 174,AND GREENS LAST WITH 172.MR KILPATRICK ANNOUNCED THE SCORES AND EVENTS:-TIMEBALL,THROWING, OBSTACLE RACES,AND LAST,THE RELAY RACES.AFTER THE RELAY RACES THERE WERE A DAD'S RACE, MUM'S RACE AND TODDLER'S RACE.BLUES HOUSE CAPTAINS WERE PRESENTED WITH A TROPHY BY MRS.WOODS WHO IS ONE OF THE SCHOOLS GOVERNORS. THE DAY BEFORE WE HAD OUR INFANTS SPORTS DAY & THE SCORES WERE ADDED TOGETHER.{EACH YEAR WE HAVE {INTER-HOUSE COMPETITIONS IN ATHLETICS, {FOOTBALL,NETBALL AND SWIMMING.
